languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Мир-корабль{/g} — это и крепость, и ковчег, и дом для миллионов эльдаров. На нем умещаются и врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}, соединяющие многочисленные миры собратьев. И армады машин Ваула, что сокрушают врагов извне. Все мы можем быть воинами, и гнев наш ужасен, если враг подбирается слишком близко. Но в мирное время каждый собрат идет своим Путем, оставаясь под защитой тех, кто ступает Путями Воинов и Провидцев".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Мир-корабль{/g} — это и крепость, и ковчег, и дом для миллионов эльдаров. На нем умещаются и врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g}, соединяющие многочисленные миры собратьев. И армады машин Ваула, что сокрушают врагов извне. Все мы можем быть воинами, и гнев наш ужасен, если враг подбирается слишком близко. Но в мирное время каждый собрат идет своим Путем, оставаясь под защитой тех, кто ступает Путями Воинов и Провидцев".

languages.text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Мир-корабль{/g} — это и крепость, и ковчег, и дом для миллионов эльдаров. languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}是要塞，是方舟，也是数百万艾达灵族的家园。方舟世界内有许多扇{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}门，连接到我们族人的众多世界，以及沃尔的机械大军，用来粉碎外部敌人。我们每个人都可以成为战士，敌人将会面对我们可怕的怒火。不过在和平时期，每位族人都可以自由选择自己的道途。那些选择了战士道途与先知道途的族人，会负责保护其他族人。”
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}是要塞，是方舟，也是数百万艾达灵族的家园。方舟世界内有许多扇{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}门，连接到我们族人的众多世界，以及沃尔的机械大军，用来粉碎外部敌人。我们每个人都可以成为战士，敌人将会面对我们可怕的怒火。不过在和平时期，每位族人都可以自由选择自己的道途。那些选择了战士道途与先知道途的族人，会负责保护其他族人。”

languages.original_text: "A craftworld is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses Webway Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

languages.text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundos astronaves{/g} son fortalezas, arcas y hogares para millones de Aeldari. Cada uno posee portales a la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g} que lo conectan con los muchos mundos de nuestros hermanos y las armadas de máquinas de Vaul que aplastan a nuestros enemigos. Todos podemos ser guerreros, y nuestra furia es aterradora para nuestros enemigos. Pero, en tiempos de paz, cada Aeldari es libre de perseguir su propia Senda, protegido por quienes recorren la Senda del Guerrero y la del Vidente».
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

traits.locale_text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundos astronaves{/g} son fortalezas, arcas y hogares para millones de Aeldari. Cada uno posee portales a la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g} que lo conectan con los muchos mundos de nuestros hermanos y las armadas de máquinas de Vaul que aplastan a nuestros enemigos. Todos podemos ser guerreros, y nuestra furia es aterradora para nuestros enemigos. Pero, en tiempos de paz, cada Aeldari es libre de perseguir su propia Senda, protegido por quienes recorren la Senda del Guerrero y la del Vidente».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}は要塞であり、箱舟であり、何百万ものアエルダリの故郷である。そこには{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}のゲートがあり、同族の数え切れないほどの世界、そして外なる敵を打ち砕くヴァールの機械の大群とつながっている。我々は皆戦士であり、敵が近づけばその怒りは凄まじいものとなる。しかし平和の間は、各支族は戦士の道と予見者の道に従う者たちの保護の下に守られ、それぞれの道を歩むことができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}は要塞であり、箱舟であり、何百万ものアエルダリの故郷である。そこには{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}のゲートがあり、同族の数え切れないほどの世界、そして外なる敵を打ち砕くヴァールの機械の大群とつながっている。我々は皆戦士であり、敵が近づけばその怒りは凄まじいものとなる。しかし平和の間は、各支族は戦士の道と予見者の道に従う者たちの保護の下に守られ、それぞれの道を歩むことができるのだ」

languages.text: "Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} ist eine Festung, eine Arche und die Heimat von Millionen von Aeldari. Durch Tore zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} ist es mit den zahlreichen Welten unseres Volkes verbunden, genau wie mit Armadas von Vauls Maschinen, die Feinde von außen vernichten. Wir können alle Krieger sein, und sollte der Feind sich nähern, ist unser Zorn furchterregend. Doch in Kriegszeiten darf jeder seinem eigenen Pfad folgen, geschützt von jenen, die den Pfad des Kriegers und des Sehers beschreiten."
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

traits.locale_text: "Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} ist eine Festung, eine Arche und die Heimat von Millionen von Aeldari. Durch Tore zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} ist es mit den zahlreichen Welten unseres Volkes verbunden, genau wie mit Armadas von Vauls Maschinen, die Feinde von außen vernichten. Wir können alle Krieger sein, und sollte der Feind sich nähern, ist unser Zorn furchterregend. Doch in Kriegszeiten darf jeder seinem eigenen Pfad folgen, geschützt von jenen, die den Pfad des Kriegers und des Sehers beschreiten."

languages.text: « Un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} est à la fois une forteresse et une arche qui abrite des millions d'Aeldaris. On y trouve des portails sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} qui le relient aux nombreux mondes de nos semblables, ainsi que des armadas de machines de Vaul prêtes à anéantir toute menace. Nous sommes tous capables de nous battre et de déchaîner notre colère sur les ennemis qui osent s'en prendre à nous. Mais en temps de paix, chacun est libre de suivre sa propre Voie, sous la protection de ceux qui ont choisi les Voies du Guerrier et du Prophète. »
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

traits.locale_text: « Un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} est à la fois une forteresse et une arche qui abrite des millions d'Aeldaris. On y trouve des portails sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} qui le relient aux nombreux mondes de nos semblables, ainsi que des armadas de machines de Vaul prêtes à anéantir toute menace. Nous sommes tous capables de nous battre et de déchaîner notre colère sur les ennemis qui osent s'en prendre à nous. Mais en temps de paix, chacun est libre de suivre sa propre Voie, sous la protection de ceux qui ont choisi les Voies du Guerrier et du Prophète. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Gemidünya{/g} bir kaledir, bir arktır, milyonlarca Aeldari'ye yuvadır. {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g} Geçitleri barındırır. Onlar sayesinde soydaşlarımızın yaşadığı sayısız dünyayla ve dış dünyadaki düşmanlarımızı ezip geçen Vaul makineleriyle dolu armadalarımızla bağlantı kurarız. Hepimizin içinde bir savaşçı yatar. Yaklaşan bir düşman karşısındaki gazabımızsa göreni dehşete düşürür. Ancak barış döneminde tüm soydaşlarım, kendi seçtikleri Yolda yürümekte özgürdür ve bu süreçte, Savaşçının ve Medyumun Yollarından yürüyenlerin koruması altındadır."
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is a fortress, an ark and a home to millions of Aeldari. It houses {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gates that connect it to the numerous worlds of our kinsmen and armadas of Vaul's machines that crush outside enemies. We can all be warriors, and our wrath is terrible to behold should the foe approach. But during the time of peace, each kinsman is free to follow their own Path, shielded under the protection of those who follow the Paths of the Warrior and the Seer."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Gemidünya{/g} bir kaledir, bir arktır ve milyonlarca Aeldari için bir yuvadır. İçinde {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g} Geçitlerini barındırır. Onlar sayesinde soydaşlarımızın yaşadığı sayısız dünyayla ve dış dünyadaki düşmanlarımızı ezip geçen Vaul makineleriyle dolu armadalarımızla bağlantı kurarız. Hepimizin içinde bir savaşçı yatar. Yaklaşan bir düşman karşısındaki gazabımızsa göreni dehşete düşürür. Ancak barış döneminde tüm soydaşlarım, kendi seçtikleri Yolda yürümekte özgürdür ve bu süreçte Savaşçının ve Medyumun Yolundan yürüyenlerin koruması altındadır."
